Science.Food and Nutrition: All living organisms need food. Food gives us energy, helps in growth, and repairs our body.
Science.Plants: Plants make their own food using sunlight through a process called photosynthesis.

Math.Fractions: A fraction represents a part of a whole. It has a numerator and a denominator.
Math.Geometry: Geometry involves shapes, lines, angles, and their properties.

Science.Heat: Heat is a form of energy. It can be transferred by conduction, convection, and radiation.
